name: Doom Dungeons
description:
Post-Gamejam Update:
We are already working on a few game updates, but given the huge number of votes we received, we will be holding off on releasing those updates till after the stream tomorrow. The stream starts at 2PM GMT, and we will have a massive 120 player UK server open from then till the stream ends.  If we scored high enough, Ben Chris and Matt will join in!

Note:
Servers sometimes lag out, but should clear up quickly.  If the game seems to stop responding, the server may have rebooted (it crashes after several hours, known bug, but we can't fix it for the jam)  Just Esc and re-connect to the server.  If you have any issues/questions, leave a comment and we'll look into it.

~~HTML5 version sometimes suffers lag.  If you experience heavy lag, try downloading the standalone version.~~ Download version removed due to unexpected corruption in the upload... will restore it after the stream tomorrow.

Controls:

Left/Right/Up/Down - Movement

Space - attack
